title: Blog Application
description: Built a blog application with PostgreSQL, Django, and Social Auth for user blogging.

title: ChatBot with User Authentication
description: Developed a chatting AI bot to talk like a Virtual Assistant.

title: Fraud Detection System
description: Built using machine learning & data mining techniques for identifying fraudulent vehicle insurance claims.

title: Heart Disease Predictor
description: Developed machine learning classifiers and executed benchmarking experiments for prominent machine learning algorithms.

title: Twitter Hashtags Analysis.
description: Identified the most common hashtags and their associated topics and analyzed the impact of removing less common hashtags on the dataset.

title: Transaction Service
description: Developed a transaction service that handles credit and debit, where every transaction updates the balance and authorization declines are recorded even if they don't affect the balance.

title: Social Media App Clone
description: Developed social media app clone with real-time chat and robust user authentication. Users can create profiles, connect with friends, share updates, and engage in instant messaging.
